title: In Some Debt? Borrow More! | Guests: Stephen Moore & Nicole Solas | 10/5/21
description:
President Biden naturally blamed the Republicans for his spending bill having a hard time getting passed, but what's actually happening? Pat Gray joins to discuss Taiwan's plea to Australia, the upcoming Supreme Court abortion case, and the sexual assault allegation against CNN's Chris Cuomo. Economist Stephen Moore joins to talk to Glenn about the economy and our supply chain. Rebecca Friedrichs, founder of For Kids and Country, joins to discuss the National School Board Association asking Biden to use the PATRIOT Act against parents. Nicole Solas, the Rhode Island mother who got sued for speaking out against CRT, joins to discuss Attorney General Merrick Garland attempting to use the FBI to respond to "threatening" parents.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
